vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Abiel = "El (God) is (my) father"
Saul's grandfather, a man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.9.1;
son of: Zeror (H6872C); married to Maacah (H4601N);
father of: Kish (H7027), Ner (H5369), Abdon (H5658J), Zur (H6698I), Baal (H1168B), Nadab (H5070J), Gedor (H1446I), Ahio (H0283I), Zecher (H2144) and Mikloth (H4732); also called Jeiel (Ketiv: Jeuel; KJV: Jehiel) at 1Ch.9.35; Ner at 1Ch.8.33; 9.39;
§ Abiel = "El (God) is (my) father"
Saul's grandfather
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Abiel = "mi padre es Dios" o "mi padre es fuerte"  abuelo del rey Saúl;  guerrero Abi-albón en tiempos del rey David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞別 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "上帝為我父"
掃羅的祖父
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚别 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "上帝为我父"
扫罗的祖父

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Abiel, a man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.23.31
Another name of a.vi-al.von (אֲבִי־עַלְבוֹן "Abi-albon" H0045)
§ Abiel = "El (God) is (my) father"
Saul's grandfather
